snippet: A McDonald's worker accused of dealing heroin in Happy Meal boxes to customers using the code phrase "I'd like to buy a toy" was being held on bail on Thursday in Pittsburgh, a spokesman for a local prosecutor said....

headline.print_headline: McDonald's Worker Charged With Selling Heroin in Happy Meal Boxes
headline.main: McDonald's Worker Charged With Selling Heroin in Happy Meal Boxes

lead_paragraph: A McDonald's worker accused of dealing heroin in Happy Meal boxes to customers using the code phrase "I'd like to buy a toy" was being held on bail on Thursday in Pittsburgh, a spokesman for a local prosecutor said.
